definitions.definition: In harness racing , a horse with a gait in which the front and back legs on opposite sides take a step together alternating with the other set of opposite legs; as opposed to a pacer .
The foot of a pig , sheep , or other quadruped , especially when prepared as meat .
A tailor 's assistant who goes around to receive orders .

secondary_definitions: In harness racing , a horse with a gait in which the front and back legs on opposite sides take a step together alternating with the other set of opposite legs; as opposed to a pacer .
The foot of a pig , sheep , or other quadruped , especially when prepared as meat .
( UK , historical ) A tailor 's assistant who goes around to receive orders .
